sentences.en: At that time our relations were going upwards, but since then they have been going downwards [downhill].
sentences.cn: 那时我们的关系是走上坡路, 此后就开始走下坡路了。

sentences.en: Bessie was on the downhill path.
Experienced snowboarders can zip downhill amazingly fast.
sentences.cn: 有经验的滑雪板运动员能够以极快的速度滑下山。

sentences.en: For the movie business, it was all downhill from there.
sentences.cn: 电影业从那时就开始完全走下坡路了。

sentences.en: He headed downhill towards the river.
His career was heading downhill fast.
I mean really, once they eliminated the choking hazard, it was all downhill for me.
sentences.cn: 我是说真的，一旦他们消除了窒息的危险，那就都是我要走的下坡路。

sentences.en: It's all downhill from here. We'll soon be finished.
sentences.cn: 这以后就容易了, 我们很快就会结束.
意大利的山坡速降滑雪冠军

sentences.en: She bent at the knee when she skied downhill.
sentences.cn: 她滑雪下山时曲膝下蹲。

sentences.en: Since I started to work longer hours things have gone steadily downhill.
sentences.cn: 自从我开始加班以来，事情日趋恶化。

sentences.en: the business is going downhill fast.
The lake itself lies only a few hundred yards off to your right and slightly downhill.
sentences.cn: 湖本身就在你右侧仅几百码的地方，稍微向山下走几步。

sentences.en: The path angled downhill and northwards.
sentences.cn: 小路向山下伸展，然后向北延伸。

sentences.en: The production in some areas went steadily downhill.
sentences.cn: 某些地区的生产在滑坡.

sentences.en: This restaurant has definitely gone downhill since I last came here.
sentences.cn: 从我上次来过之后,这家餐馆越来越糟.

sentences.en: We began a steady downhill run.
sentences.cn: 我们开始了一场匀速的下山赛跑。

sentences.en: Well, I guess it's all downhill from here.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我猜从此以后就容易了。

sentences.en: You can coast downhill on a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 你可以骑自行车滑下坡.

trans.tran_cn: 向下的，下降的，倾斜的，[体]下降滑雪的
向山下，如下坡一般，每况愈下
